edu.rit.pj2.vbl

Class DoubleVbl.Min

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.Tuple
      • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.DoubleVbl
        • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.DoubleVbl.Min
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, Vbl, Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    DoubleVbl

    public static class DoubleVbl.Min
extends DoubleVbl
    Class DoubleVbl.Min provides a double precision floating point reduction variable, with minimum as the reduction operation.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class edu.rit.pj2.vbl.DoubleVbl

    • Constructor Detail

      • DoubleVbl.Min

        public DoubleVbl.Min()
        Construct a new shared double precision floating point variable. The item's initial value is 0.0.

      • DoubleVbl.Min

        public DoubleVbl.Min(double value)
        Construct a new shared double precision floating point variable with the given initial value.
        Parameters:
        value - Initial value.

    • Method Detail

      • reduce

        public void reduce(Vbl vbl)
        Reduce the given shared variable into this shared variable. The two items are combined together using the minimum operation, and the result is stored in this shared variable.
        Specified by:
        reduce in interface Vbl
        Overrides:
        reduce in class DoubleVbl
        Parameters:
        vbl - Shared variable.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the class of vbl is not compatible with the class of this shared variable.
